question: In many countries more and more young people are leaving schools but unable to find a job. What problem do you think youth unemployment causes for individuals and for societies? What measures should be taken to reduce level of unemployment for youngsters.
text: Finding a substantial job is not a rosy path nowadays, several realms across the globe are facing this detrimental issue of unemployment. My essay will analyze the root causes of this agenda along with addressing suitable solutions.

Unavailability of work can have some adverse effect on society and individuals as well. Firstly, being workers for a long duration can cause mental retardation because of a lack of money and poor financial status. In result, due to unbearable stress ,a person is left with no way to take the wrong step, thus, committing crimes for money. Secondly, developments of  the nation drastically depend on the skills and efforts by  the young generation, consequently,deficiency of skilful works can  seize the development of the country.

There are certain remedies of matters which are needed to be applied immediately. To embark with proper education should be first precedence in order to apply for work, for this education system must be fair and affordable. This is because a literate human, besides acquiring the academic values comprises many innovative ideas which can help to create a change, if not one place than another. Thus, an educated person always holds value. Furthermore, regimes should take a brief consideration abandoned and government properties for inauguration new business infrastructure. For instance, a shopping mall in the area can be home for work to many individuals and will generate revenue from buyers, subsequently acting in tandem for providing jobs and spiking the development of the nation.
In a nutshell, the problem of unemployment needs to be addressed as soon as possible and providing education could be the  best antidote for handling the issue.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the phrase first precedence does not contain the correct article usage. Consider making a change.
